FuncDef: This command configures aa-sub accounting statistics for export of applications of a given AA ISA group/partition.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing application name, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the method of statistics export to be used. Values-accounting-policy, radius-accounting-policy.

Allows the operator to enable the referred application group to be selected (via Diameter) for Gx-usage monitoring. Gx usage monitoring is enabled automatically (and this command is not shown) if the export-using parameter is selected for the respective application group.
